name: Priya Iyer
body:
# **Projects**
## Twist-User Timeline Tweets Classifier
[Twist](http://www.flickr.com/photos/93125173@N03/10238880743/in/photostream/)
### As part of a class project, we created a tweet classifier. This classifier classifies the tweets appearing on the user's home timeline into Sports, Finance, Technology, Entertainment and Others.
### [Code](https://github.com/priya-I/Twist)
***
## Avaaj Otalo - Data Visualization
[AO](http://www.flickr.com/photos/93125173@N03/10238787816/in/photostream/)
### Visualization of the usage logs of a project called 'Avaaj Otalo' based out of rural India. This platform is used by the farmers to get their agricultural questions answered. Topics range from fertilizers, seeds, pesticides, seasons to harvesting.
### [Visualization](priya-i.github.io/visualize-ao)

***
## Avaaj Otalo - Topic Predictor
### Predicted the topics that farmers would call about next on the Avaaj Otalo Platform based on the time of the year, farmer's village and the crop.
### [Code & Documentation](https://github.com/priya-I/AOMining)
***
## Exoskeleton Controller with Visual Feedback
### Our project aims to improve the user interface of an existing wired controller for an exoskeleton (exo) which helps paraplegics walk with more natural strides. Aside from converting to a wireless controller, we plan to design a more intuitive user interface which not only removes the “unknown” for users during exo operations by providing instant feedback to instill a sense of security, but also accommodates varying stride lengths during walking. To accomplish our goals, we will combine user input and mechanical output with visual feedback.
### Photos: Coming soon!

***
